item.title: Linear Regression Simulation Study
item.description: Multiple linear regression. visualization. using plotly. . . . In general, linear regression is a linear approach of modelling the relationship of a numerical response (dependent) variable and one or more explanatory (independent) variables. Theories Model Assumptions Let: \(y_i \in \mathbb{R}^n\) as the measured response for the \(i\)th subject. \(x_i = (1, x_{i1}, ..., x_{ip}) \in \mathbb{R}^{p+1}\), \(i = 1, 2, ..., n\), be the values of the explanatory values for the \(i\)th subject.
